TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnumerableRowCollection`1<TRow> extends System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TRow>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.typeparam: The type of objects in the source sequence, typically .
Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects returned from a query. This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection%601> is used to contain the results of a LINQ to DataSet query.
An <xref:System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection%601> cannot be directly instantiated because there are no public constructors for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<!TRow> GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator for the collection of contained row objects. This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.returns: A strongly-typed that can be used to traverse the collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When used with [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] queries, `Trow` will be of type <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
This method cannot be overridden.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator for the collection of objects. This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.returns: An that can be used to traverse the collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection%601.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
This method cannot be overridden.
